00023 #ifndef _GR_ROTATOR_H_
00024 #define _GR_ROTATOR_H_
00025 
00026 #include <gr_complex.h>
00027 
00028 class gr_rotator {
00029   gr_complex    d_phase;
00030   gr_complex    d_phase_incr;
00031 
00032  public:
00033   gr_rotator () : d_phase (1), d_phase_incr (0) { }
00034 
00035   void set_phase (gr_complex phase)     { d_phase = phase; }
00036   void set_phase_incr (gr_complex incr) { d_phase_incr = incr; }
00037 
00038   gr_complex rotate (gr_complex in){
00039     d_phase *= d_phase_incr;    // incr our phase (complex mult == add phases)
00040 
00041     d_phase /= abs(d_phase);    // ensure multiplication is rotation
00042                                 // FIXME.  This is expensive.  Maybe workaround using
00043                                 // double precision complex???
00044 
00045     return in * d_phase;        // rotate in by phase
00046   }
00047 
00048 };
00049 
00050 #endif /* _GR_ROTATOR_H_ */
